00028   template <class T, int dimension>
00029   class  NVector_t
00030   {
00031     template <class _T, int _dimension> friend  NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator-(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &b);
00032     template <class _T, int _dimension> friend  NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator+(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &b);
00033     template <class _T, int _dimension> friend  NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator*(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, float c);
00034     template <class _T, int _dimension> friend  NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator*(float c, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a);
00035     template <class _T, int _dimension> friend  NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator/(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, float c);
00036     template <class _T, int _dimension> friend  Double_t norm(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a);
00037     template <class _T, int _dimension> friend  Double_t dot(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &b);
00038     friend ThreeVector_t cross(const ThreeVector_t &a, const ThreeVector_t &b);

00045     NVector_t &clear() {
00046       for (UInt_t  i=0; i<dimension; i++) {_x[i]=0;};
00047       return *this;
00048     };
00049 
00052     UInt_t n() const {return dimension;};

00059     NVector_t &set(const T *array) {
00060       for (UInt_t  i=0; i<dimension; i++) {_x[i]=array[i];};
00061       return *this;
00062     };
00063

00072 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00073       throw(std::range_error)
00074 #endif
00075     {
00076 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00077       if (index>=dimension) {
00078         throw std::range_error("NVector_t> out of range error");
00079       }
00080 #endif
00081       return _x[index];
00082     };

00092 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00093       throw (std::range_error)
00094 #endif

00096 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00097       if (index>=dimension) {
00098         throw std::range_error("NVector_t> out of range error");
00099       }
00100 #endif
00101       return _x[index];

00109       for (UInt_t  i=0; i<dimension; i++) {_x[i]+=a._x[i];};
00110       return *this;
00111     };

00149   template <class _T, int _dimension>
00150   inline NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator-(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &b)
00151   {
00152     NVector_t<_T,_dimension> res;
00153     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {res._x[i]=a._x[i]-b._x[i];};
00154     return res;
00155   }
00156 
00159   template <class _T,int _dimension>
00160   inline NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator+(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &b)
00161   {
00162     NVector_t<_T,_dimension> res;
00163     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {res._x[i]=a._x[i]+b._x[i];};
00164     return res;
00165   }

00170   template <class _T,int _dimension>
00171   inline NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator*(const float c, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a)
00172   {
00173     NVector_t<_T,_dimension> res;
00174     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {res._x[i]=c*a._x[i];};
00175     return res;
00176   }

00182   inline NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator*(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const float c)
00183   {
00184     NVector_t<_T,_dimension> res;
00185     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {res._x[i]=c*a._x[i];};
00186     return res;

00192   template <class _T,int _dimension>
00193   inline NVector_t<_T,_dimension> operator/(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const float c)
00194   {
00195     NVector_t<_T,_dimension> res;
00196     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {res._x[i]=a._x[i]/c;};
00197     return res;
00198   }

00202   template <class _T,int _dimension>
00203   inline Double_t dot(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &b)
00204   {
00205     Double_t sum=0.;
00206     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {sum+=a._x[i]*b._x[i];};
00207     return sum;
00208   }
00209 
00212   template <class _T,int _dimension>
00213   inline Double_t dotOfDifference(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &b)
00214   {
00215     Double_t sum=0.;
00216     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {_T temp=a[i]-b[i]; sum+=temp*temp;};
00217     return sum;
00218   }
00219 
00222   template <class _T,int _dimension>
00223   inline Double_t norm(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &a)
00224   {
00225     Double_t sum=0.;
00226     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<_dimension; i++) {sum+=a._x[i]*a._x[i];};
00227     return sqrt(sum);
00228   }
00229 
00236   template <class _T,int _dimension>
00237   Float_t distance(const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &line_origin, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &line_direction, const NVector_t<_T,_dimension> &point) {
00238     //_axis has norm 1
00239     NVector_t<_T,_dimension> delta=point-line_origin;
00240     Double_t r=dot(delta,line_direction);
00241     return norm(delta-r*line_direction);
00242   }

00247   inline ThreeVector_t cross(const ThreeVector_t &a, const ThreeVector_t &b)
00248   {
00249     const UInt_t cross_index[3][2]={{1,2},{2,3},{3,1}};
00250     ThreeVector_t res;
00251     for (UInt_t  i=0; i<3; i++) {res[i]+=a._x[cross_index[i][0]]*b._x[cross_index[i][1]]-a._x[cross_index[i][1]]*b._x[cross_index[i][0]];};
00252     return res;
00253   }
